Please well backup your Mnemonic, and ke: Please well backup your Mnemonic, and keep it in a secure and safe place, once the Mnemonic get lost, it cannot be retrieved!!
Step1 - Select the RS token, and then in: 步骤1 - 请选择 RS Contract 通证, 并输入数量
Step2 - Based on selected RS token and i: Step2 - Based on selected RS token and inserted amount, platform will provide you the amount of RBTC that you will need in this time's redeem request, if you don't have sufficent RBTC, you could deposit RBTC via Deposit function
Step3 - Click Submit to send your redeem: 步骤3 - 请按下提交按键来提交您的赎回请求, 您的 BTC 将在本次请求被确认后发送至您在 RIO DeFi 平台资产页面的 BTC 钱包
- After redeem request is sent successfu: - 一旦赎回请求发送成功，您在本次赎回请求里提交的 RBTC 和 RS Contract 通证将被暂时锁定并在提交被确认时归还
- Saving Program phases and exchange ra: -  存币生息 - 阶段和兑换率对应表
Phase1: 1 BTC = 10,000 RBTC + 1 RS P1 Co: 阶段1: 1 BTC = 10,000 RBTC + 1 RS P1 Contract
Phase2: 1 BTC = 9,000 RBTC + 1 RS P2 Con: 阶段2: 1 BTC = 9,000 RBTC + 1 RS P2 Contract
Phase3: 1 BTC = 8,000 RBTC + 1 RS P3 Con: 阶段3: 1 BTC = 8,000 RBTC + 1 RS P3 Contract
Phase4: 1 BTC = 7,000 RBTC + 1 RS P4 Con: 阶段4: 1 BTC = 7,000 RBTC + 1 RS P4 Contract
Phase5: 1 BTC = 6,000 RBTC + 1 RS P5 Con: 阶段5: 1 BTC = 6,000 RBTC + 1 RS P5 Contract
Step1 - Select your desired loan package: 步骤1 - 请选择贷款方案
Step2 - Input the desired amount of BTC: 步骤2 - 请输入您想抵押的 BTC 数量
Step3 - Input the amount of RIO you wann: 步骤3 - 请输入您想借贷的 RIO 数量 (您最多可借贷的 RIO 数量等于您在步骤2时质押之 BTC 所生成的可用信用额度)
Step4 - Submit your loan request: 步骤4 - 提交您的借贷申请
Step5 - Enter passcode to confirm your r: 步骤5 - 输入您的账户密码来确认此笔贷款申请，一旦确认成功, 您的贷款将自动发放至您在 Rio DeFi 平台上的 RIO 钱包里
- If you wanna increase your Credit Line: - 如果您需要增加您的信用额度，您只需要将 BTC 转入到您在 Rio DeFi 平台上的 BTC 钱包
- Value of your Credit Line is linked to: - 您信用额度的价值和 BTC 当前的市场价格 (美金计价) 是联动的
- You could repay your loan at anytime b: - 您能随时偿还您的贷款，但请注意，提前偿还将不退还您已支付的利息
- As long as your available credit line: - 只要您该笔贷款的信用额度不为0，您就还能继续在此笔贷款上办理续借，续借的额度等于您剩余的信用额度
- Platform will auto-liquidate your BTC: - 在以下情况发生时，本平台将执行贷款抵押物(BTC)的清算
> Once BTC price hits Liquidation Thresh: > 一旦 BTC 的市场价格达到了该笔贷款的清算价格
click to select or drag and drop the fil: 点击此处来选择档案，您亦可直接将档案拖曳到此处
Step1 - Check status of current saving p: 步骤1 - 请先查看当前存币生息阶段的状态
Step2 - Input the BTC amount that you wa: 步骤2 - 请输入您想存入的 BTC 数量，亦或是输入您想获得的 RBTC 数量
Step3 - Submit the saving request: 步骤3 - 提交您的存币生息请求
Step4 - Input the passcode to approve th: 步骤4 - 输入您的账户密码来确认您此次申请提交
- After staking is done successfully, RB: - 当此次的提交成功后，您的 RBTC/RS Contract 通证将自动发送至您在 Rio DeFi 平台上的 RBTC/RS Contract 钱包
- RS contract is used to Unstake your BT: - RS contract 是用来赎回您所质押之 BTC 的通证
- You could use the provided Calculator: - 您能使用平台提供的存币生息计算器来计算您可获得的 RBTC 数量(计算的结果仅供参考)
- Staking Phases and exchange rate mappi: - 存币生息 - 阶段和兑换率对应表
Phase1: N BTC = 10,000*N RBTC + N RS P1: 阶段1: N BTC = 10,000*N RBTC + N RS P1 Contract
Phase2: N BTC = 8,000*N RBTC + N RS P2: 阶段2: N BTC =   8,000*N RBTC + N RS P2 Contract
Phase3: N BTC = 6,000*N RBTC + N RS P3: 阶段3: N BTC =   6,000*N RBTC + N RS P3 Contract
Phase4: N BTC = 4,000*N RBTC + N RS P4: 阶段4: N BTC =   4,000*N RBTC + N RS P4 Contract
Phase5: N BTC = 2,000*N RBTC + N RS P5: 阶段5: N BTC =   2,000*N RBTC + N RS P5 Contract
